body_html: We tested this and this seems to work. Is this the intended behavior of the GCS tf reader? What are the (broader) consequences of setting GCS_READ_CACHE_MAX_SIZE_MB=0? It isn't clear to me what the consequences are of embracing this approach (maybe nothing negative!).

body: We tested this and this seems to work.  Is this the intended behavior of the GCS tf reader?  What are the (broader) consequences of setting GCS_READ_CACHE_MAX_SIZE_MB=0?  It isn't clear to me what the consequences are of embracing this approach (maybe nothing negative!).
